name: Turn off the light... please!
description:
Climate Jam 2021 - By ILIKESCIFI Games

My submission for the Climate game jam 2021.
Unfortunately I only had one evening to turn a small but important message into a little "game". So here we go! 

Please turn off the lights during daytime  - it saves a lot of energy & recources!
